alert.note: Alert for Central and Eastern Allegany; Extreme Western Allegany; Garrett (Maryland) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Baltimore/Washington (Washington D.C., Central Maryland, Northern Virginia, Eastern West Virginia)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued January 09 at 9:09PM EST until January 10 at 12:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore/Washington
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL MIDNIGHT EST TONIGHT... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 6 AM TO 5 PM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...For the Dense Fog Advisory, visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. For the Wind Advisory, west winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...In Maryland, Garrett, Extreme Western Allegany and Central and Eastern Allegany Counties. In West Virginia, Western Grant, Western Mineral and Eastern Mineral Counties. * WHEN...For the Dense Fog Advisory, until midnight EST tonight. For the Wind Advisory, from 6 AM to 5 PM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Central and Eastern Allegany; Extreme Western Allegany; Garrett
